text:
I just got off the phone
with Estelle. Guess what?
I got the lead in a movie!

You got the lead in a movie?
That's amazing!

- What's the movie about?
- Oh, uh..

It's called "Shutter Speed",
it's really cool, yeah, um..

Well, I meet this girl in
the subway and we fall in love

in like, a day, right?
And then, she disappears.

But I find out where she lives
and when I get there

this like, old lady
answers the door and I say
"Where's Betsy?", right?

And she says, "Betsy's been dead
for ten years."

- Ooh-ooh, chilling!
- Yeah.
Oh, and the best part is

we're filming in the desert
outside of Vegas!

You know what
that means, buddy!

Yeah, I know what
that means, buddy!

- Road trip!
- Yeah, baby!
Yeah, we can rent a car!

I-I just have to be there
by Tuesday.

Oh, wait!
My grandmother's dead.

Well, uh, we can talk
about that too, Pheebs.
No, no, her cab.

She probably
won't be using it.

You can drive it
to Las Vegas.
Alright. Thanks, Pheebs!
Whoa, whoa, whoa.

What are we gonna do
about my job?
Oh, um, not go!

Alright, great!
Road trip, baby!

So, so which route
should I take?

The northern route
or-or the southern route?

Ooh, if you take
the northern route

there's a man in Illinois
with a beard of bees.
Great! Problem solved!

But on the southern route,
there's a chicken
that plays tic-tac-toe.
Well, back to square one.

Oh, I know a way
that you can decide.

Alright, I'm gonna ask you
a series of questions

and you answer
as quickly as you can.
Yes!
Good. But wait.

Alright, here we go.
Now, I want you to relax.
Take a deep breath.

Clear your mind.
Which do you like better?

- Peanut butter or egg whites?
- Peanut butter!
Which would you rather be?

- A fireman or a swimmer?
- A swimmer.

Who would you rather sleep
with, Monica or Rachel?
Monica. Oh.

Huh, I always thought
it would be Rachel.
[clearing throat]

- No thinking! No thinking!
- Oh-oh.

- Tie or ascot?
- Ascot.

- North route or south route?
- North route.
Bam! There you go! Huh?

Wow! That was incredible!
Beard of bees, here I come!

Yeah, listen, how cold
is it gonna be there?

Do I need a coat or will all
these sweater vests be enough?

- What?
- I love you.

Man, I wish Ross
was coming with us.

- You know? I'm gonna miss him.
- Thanks a lot.

I just got that jerk
out of my mind!

Hey, so where
are we staying?

Is the movie
putting us up

in a big,
uh, hotel suite?
Uh, no, not really.

It's an independent film
you know?

So we don't have
a real big budget.

I figured I'd
just stay in your room.

I see, but once you get
your first paycheck

you'll be springing
for a big hotel suite, right?

I mean, lead in a movie,
they must be paying you a lot?
Oh, yeah. Check this out.

For every dollar
"Shutter Speed" makes

one penny of it goes
right in Joey's pocket.

So you don't get paid
unless the movie makes money?

Did you not hear
the plot of the movie?

"She's been dead
for ten years."

I'm gonna be
a millionaire!

Okay, uh, would you rather
be too wet or too dry?
Too dry.

Do you believe
in ghosts, yes, or no?
No.

Is this movie gonna
be my big break?
No.

- What?
- Yes.

- Dude, you said no.
- Well, I also said yes.

Well, you don't think this is
going to be a big break for me?
No..
I don't believe this.

Look, Joe, I just,
I just don't want you

to get your hopes
up too high, you know?

What are you talking about?
I'm the lead in a movie.
They're not even paying you.

This doesn't even sound
like a real movie.

You know what?
I don't need this, okay?

I don't know why you're
dumping all over my big break.

'Cause, Joe, I don't think this
is going to be your big break.

Is that why you're
on this trip, huh?

To make me feel
like a loser?

'Cause if it is, I'll tell ya,
I-I-I'd rather be alone.

Oh, you don't
want me on the trip?

Well, not if you're going
to be like this.

Well, I'll tell you what,
the next time you ask me

a question like that,
I'll lie.

Yeah, I don't want
you on the trip.

Alright, fine, fine,
why don't you pull over
I'll get out right now.
Fine.
[tires screeching]
[cars honking]
Get out.

You're not actually
supposed to stop on a bridge.

- Get out!
- Alright!
Hey.

Chandler, what
are you doing here?

Joey kicked me out of the car
on the George Washington Bridge.

- Why?
- Why?

He went crazy, you know
we were playing that game where

where you ask a question and you
have to answer really fast.

Oh, that game should not be
played without my supervision.

Well, I don't know what
made him so mad, you know.

All I said was that,
uh, I didn't think

this was going to be
his big break.

That this movie wasn't
going to do anything for him

and that, uh, you know,
didn't sound like a real movie.

Okay, he should have
pushed me off the bridge.
What's in the bag?

Oh, I figured you guys
would all be mad at me

so I got you some gifts that I
found on the side of the road.

Who wants the teddy bear
with one leg?
I do!
